column5: The first thing i noticed is that the semi erect hourglassing is more  while I am standing. Sometimes it doesn't appear at all. It gets worse when I have anxiety. Good message bro...
Have the same problem. More in cold weather. Have anxiety problem. Happening for long time.
How long it has been happening? Does it occur more in cold environment? Do you have pain during erection? Do you have anxiety problem?
I think talking with someone will help you to reduce the stress.
